website_summaries.verdict: A cloth cover that keeps your steering wheel cool to the touch and protects your original wheel from fading.
pros: Doesn't slide around on the wheel
Cloth stays a neutral temperature – not too hot or too cold
cons: The cloth on this model can make the steering wheel more slippery than other covers

customer_reviews.title: Love the pop of colors
customer_reviews.text: Adds such a beautiful me element to my 2012 red vw beetle. I wouldn't say it was simple to install because it takes some elbow grease, but it didn't take me to long to work it on (less than 5 mins). I found it best to start from the top of the wheel and work evenly around both sides. When I got towards the bottom of the wheel I pulled the cover opened and worked my way around until it was completely on.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE SMELL! DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this thing is truly horrific. It smells like a dead grandmother entombed in moth balls. If I were to put this in my car and take it to work, I don't think I would be able to get back in the car at the end of the day. I'm hoping this is just something that needs to offgas, so I'll give it a week in the garage and see if the smell goes away. If not it will have to go back. I would NOT RECOMMEND THIS! Edit: It never did offgas and the smell was so horrible I had to get a refund. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS!
customer_reviews.author: B. Dub

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, looks nice, and seems durable!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this would be as durable-feeling as it is (has a sort of rubber in-lining that helps to keep its round structure). The last steering wheel cover I had was just a more flimsy and stretchy piece of cloth that wrapped around my wheel. This cover feels sturdy, yet the cloth on the outside is soft enough and feels nice. LOVE the pattern too, and I really think this will help protect my hands from my scorching hot steering wheel when it's over 100 degrees here in Tucson. Great product for such a reasonable price. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: mhyeonh

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: It fits on my Toyota Camry perfectly. Super cute design and looks exactly as pictured. I do have to agree with the other reviewers though - there was an awful stench. It had a really strong rubbery tire smell but I just threw it in the washing machine and it was fine after that!
customer_reviews.author: My Vo

customer_reviews.title: Don't try it with a 2008 F150
customer_reviews.text: I don't care who you are...this is too small for a 2008 F150 steering wheel. I broke the rubber insides stretching it with my bionic forearms and my massively overbuilt muscular stretching system. I mean it's on...but it ain't on the right way. I bought one of these before and it fit my 2000 Ranger truck steering wheel, but we all know those trucks are wannabes-not real trucks. Now I feel so bad I can't send it back because I split the underlayment stretching it on the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sweedledick

customer_reviews.title: Mehhhh
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should've read the demensions of the steering wheel before buying it, because it's a tad too big for my 2013 Honda Civic steering wheel. Smelled horrible when I opened it but it did go away! Material is a little rough; nothing that's uncomfortable. Overall a nice steering wheel cover. The description should be a little more specific on the size, though.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: It's just fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is fine. It does have a smell but my passenger said "How old is your car? It still smells new!", so if anything it's flattering. The smell isn't as strong as other reviews make it sound, but it is persistent. I've had this thing about a month and on a hot day it's the predominant smell (over the sweet-smelling crap I try to get my car to smell like). It's been fading, though, and I'm pretty sure it won't last forever. They do suggest that you leave it out in the sun; if you aren't in a rush, you might want to do this for several days or longer if you're really prone to nausea/malaise from rubbery smells.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie V

customer_reviews.title: then it should be hella easy to slip on
customer_reviews.text: okay this is rlly cute but it's so fkn hard to get on the wheel. i have a 2015 kia soul and it took me legit 47 minutes of strenuous work to get it on. pro tip: put the wheel cover in your car 24 hours before to let the heat stretch it out a bit. then it should be hella easy to slip on.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but that smell!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the other reviewers were right when they mentioned the smell of this thing. Yowza! I've had it on for about a month and it still reeks of rubber (and I leave my windows open whenever I can). I'd suggest when you get it leaving it outside for a while if you can to reduce the odor because truly, it is overwhelming, and you don't want that smell on your hands when you get to work. Otherwise, I really like it. It fit well, took less than five minutes to put on and the colors are not as bright as they look on the screen so it doesn't scare you like the smell does when you get in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Vel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover. A little difficult to get on because it’s made out of what seems like a rubber tire but I like that about it because it does not slip and it’s extra thick and does not seem like it will tear easy. My only dislike is the smell. It seems to have a strong rubber sent to it but because it’s such a heavy duty cover and very pretty I’m willing to put up with the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Staycnoe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this steering wheel cover but let me tell you it is extremely hard to install. Took two of us, one to pull and another to get the edges over the wheel. This is my second one but the first one would still be fine if it wasn't for the fact that it was stolen along with our car. Holds up well and makes a huge difference in our extremely hot climate.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: Great cover, renewed my crumbling steering wheel. Colors not quite as bright as pictured. READ DIRECTIONS for installation and you will have no problem installing. New tire rubber smell, put in wash machine on gentle and air dry solves that problem. All I have to say about the reviewers complaining about smelly hands... Wash your hands and problem solved. As for cancer causing labels required for californians, its made of rubber....duh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Lynne

customer_reviews.title: very nicely. I got it to help combat the heat- ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't count on getting this off your steering wheel anytime soon without either a machete or sheers. It's a pain to put on but handles very, very nicely. I got it to help combat the heat- in the sun, my steering wheel would often heat up to the point where grabbing it barehanded wasn't fun. But this cover makes driving even in the summer a lot more manageable. Other reviewers have complained about the neoprene smell. The smell is potent for the first couple days but it eventually fades away.
customer_reviews.author: Ron K.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This gets 3 starts because the price is right and it's cute. HOWEVER, just be aware that after the thing has been on your steering wheel for a few months, the grips don't work. I began steering my car into a turn only to realize the steering wheel cover was moving, but the car was heading straight. Needless to say, it resulted in a panicked swerve. As long as you make absolute certain you aren't just moving the steering wheel cover and not the full steering wheel, it's cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jessb

customer_reviews.title: Stinks to High Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Worst chemical smell ever. The item came tightly wrapped in plastic. If it was not wrapped, the delivery guy might have passed out from the chemicals in the item. As soon as I opened the plastic the acrid smell overpowered me. Airing it out did no good. I refused to put it in my car. My husband decided to put it in his car, hoping the smell would dissipate. He got terrible headaches. If you drive even a short distance the chemical smell stays on your hands. In addition to the smell, the fabric has already pilled up after a very short period of use. If you value your health, do not purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not strong enough.
customer_reviews.text: After installing the cover, part of the lining material broke thus forming a bulk on the lower part of the steering curb. It looks great and the driving experience is fine, but now I have a lump around the lower area of the steering. It was so hard to install that I do not want to remove it until the vendor contacts me with a solution. (there is not way of contacting the seller, therefore I am writing the review in hopes that the seller will read it and contact me. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: JD Consulting

customer_reviews.title: Wheel cover
customer_reviews.text: I really like this it’s very unique and pretty! I freaked out when it said can cause cancer but I noticed when I went to an auto store that all the steering covers from different brands said the same thing so it was a go for me I washed it but could steel smell the chemicals then after a couple months it went away and I’ve had this for a yr now! I might go ahead and order another!
customer_reviews.author: Teressa

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This steering wheel cover is great! I bought it as a gift for my girlfriend as I saw her eyeing one down at the store. For starters, it is a great price in comparison to the one she wanted; however, it looks just as good if not better. The feel to it is comfortable but it is not very smooth which is not a problem at all. we have had it for a couple of months and it still looks very clean and has kept its color. definitely a great investment
customer_reviews.author: axel perez

customer_reviews.title: I like this one
customer_reviews.text: I had an old steering wheel cover that had vinyl lining the edges. After a couple of years, the vinyl started breaking down and splitting, sending sharp shards into my fingers. I was distracted from driving as I kept trying to pull it off. Finally I broke down and ordered a new cover. I like this one. It's comfy for my hands. It looks like something a follower of the Grateful Dead would have had in their car. Best of all, no vinyl!
customer_reviews.author: Flyswatter

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose purchased for just fine..
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose purchased for just fine ... as a steering wheel cover to protect the OEM steering wheel leather. Doesn't feel like high quality material / build but I got it because it was a good price so didn't expect it to be high quality. Fingers crossed that it will last at least a couple of years before disintegrating in our SoCal sun.
customer_reviews.author: SD Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Great!
customer_reviews.text: So Far So Great! I ordered this for my new Jeep. I love the colors and design, I do wish it was a little brighter with the colors. The material appears to be made well and durable. The fit over the wheel is prefect. The feel of the cover is nice when gripping and driving. I hope it last for a while and stays in good shape and clean. I would definitely recommend it for others. I am also very pleased with the Price!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: The design and make seem fine, its the fact that it smells like a ...
customer_reviews.text: The design and make seem fine, its the fact that it smells like a dead animal. Not an over exaggeration either. I am going to try to soak it (outdoors not in my washer) and let it air for probably a week and see where we stand. I hate returning things if I don't have to but I really cant even be in the same room with this thing let alone put it in my car yet. I am pretty disappointed that its not ready for immediate use, really given the smell I should probably return it because its probably unsanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool
customer_reviews.text: I really like my steering wheel cover, I think it looks cool and adds a great touch of color to my black car. It was a little hard to get on, but only took me a few minutes, no big deal. I'm only giving it 4 stars because it stinks. The stink is starting to wear off, but it was really stinky at first. Aside from that, love it!
customer_reviews.author: amajyn

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this steering wheel cover a lot! It keeps my steering wheel from being too cold in the winter and I love the design. However, I've had it for a couple of months now and it STILL makes my hands smell like a tire shop every time I drive. Also, it was really difficult to install, but I understand that it needs to be pretty tight to fit correctly on the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Scott

customer_reviews.title: Like other people have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Like other people have mentioned, there was a fairly strong rubbery smell when I first got this item. However this went away within a few days. All in all I like this item and it adds a cute little pop of color to my black Honda CRV. My only complaint is that the material is a bit scratchy, which irritated me at first. It took a while to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO BIG and SMELLS AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what kind of car the manufacturer thought this steering wheel cover would fit, but it certainly does not fit any Honda or Toyota. It is HUGE. Also, it has an AWFUL, TERRIBLE plastic/rubber smell. So bad, that I had to throw it out. HEADACHE kind of smell. Unless you’re driving a tractor trailer and have no sense of smell, this product is not for you. No wonder it was so cheap...
customer_reviews.author: SusanAnn

customer_reviews.title: Standard Steering Wheel Size Needed!
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for a standard 15" steering wheel. This didn't fit our '07 Toyota Prius, but it did fit our '07 Chevy Equinox. I like that it beefs up the steering wheel a little bit so it's easier on my hands to hold. I have rheumatoid arthritis and gripping can be difficult some days; this cover helps alleviate some of that.
customer_reviews.author: Abster

customer_reviews.title: Goes beautifully with some new car seat covers I bought for ...
customer_reviews.text: Goes beautifully with some new car seat covers I bought for my 2017 Honda CR-V. I was worried it wouldn't fit because I have an SUV but I figured I'd buy it and could always return it if it didn't fit. This thing went right on! Definitely took some elbow grease like with any steering wheel cover installation but I'd say it only took me about 5 minutes of intense determination.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: STINKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for way too long and have not been able to put it on my steering wheel. It STINKS! I put it in the sun for days. I have it in the garage we’re it gets cold in the winter and nothing has worked. It’s a bummer because I really like the pattern and wish I could put it on! One star for the pattern
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Whyyyyyyyy does it have to smell so bad :(
customer_reviews.text: I love this steering wheel cover because it looks awesome, fits perfectly, and seems to be made really well. Unfortunately, I can't give this 5 stars because the smell of rubber (like tires) is soooo strong. I'm glad it's not winter anymore because I have to drive with the window down so I don't get a headache and I have to wash my hands to get the smell of them, every time I drive. I'm really hoping it gets better with time because I love everything else about it. Such a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Jen

customer_reviews.title: life changing
customer_reviews.text: Woo hoo. I live in Phoenix, and have a convertible. This has been a life changer. It has saved my hands from getting burned. It feels nice in your hands while turning. The price was perfect. There is one issue I have with it, but it is My issue. I worry about cleaning it as I am a germaphobe. I scotch guarded it before using, so that should help.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Ensure that you have a pretty close relationship with whoever else will be trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing was definitely a two-person challenge to get on! Ensure that you have a pretty close relationship with whoever else will be trying to help you stretch this thing onto steering wheel. Let it sit in 100+ degree truck for over 12 hours, and it still was stiff and unwieldy. Once on, looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond65

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quality, love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!! Got it as a gift for my girlfriend and she loves it! Got a great grip and feel to it, colors are vibrant and she gets compliments on it all the time. Some little fabric pills or bumps have developed around it but no more than what’s expected getting touched so often and sitting in the heat all the time. Not knocking a star off for the natural response of the fabric, excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Kranjis McBasketball

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new-to-me used van and wanted to dress it up inside a little bit. I love the design of this and I love how it feels under my hands. It's summer now but I think I'm going to love it in the winter when it's cold because the steering wheel won't be so cold under my hands. The only thing I didn't like is that it had a strong rubbery scent for the first couple of weeks. Luckily that faded and now I can't smell it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Morris

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but smells toxic...
customer_reviews.text: I got this about 6 months ago. Looks great, fits well. After installation, the next day wow the car stunk with the smell of rubber and chemicals. It was so bad I had to keep my windows down to get fresh air. My kids wanted me to get rid of it for safety reasons but I thought the smell would go away eventually cause it looks good. It took months! It smells a lot less now, but if you are somewhat sensitive to smells, I would skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Razzle Dazzle

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, tough to fit on and has a funky smell
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! It was very difficult to put this bad boy on. I would suggest two things if you buy this: 1. Let the cover air dry for a few days to let the rubbery smell dissipate. 2. Use a hair dryer to loosen the steering wheel cover right before you put it on. I thought I was going to break my steering column when I was putting this on. It fits VERY snug on my 1999 Jeep Wrangler
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love but did not fit my wheel
customer_reviews.text: Love this but sadly it didn't fit the wheel of my 2010 Jeep Wrangler :( I tried so many times to get it on, I had other people try for me, I left it in the sun to soften it then tried, and it was not happening. So beware, it will not fit all steering wheels! I gave it to a friend and it looked so cute in her car.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: the CUTEST cover ever, for an amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: uhg, ok, let me start by saying I am IN LOVE with this cover. its so cheep in price, and extremely well made. the only thing is,,,, and I cannot stress this enough chiefs,,,, putting it on was the most difficult thing I've had to do in my 18 years of life. but like,, all good things come with a cost?? I EVENTUALLY got that bad boy on though, as u can so clearly see. so all in all it was a 100% worth it buy.
customer_reviews.author: yvette belli

customer_reviews.title: I tried to like it!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this steering wheel cover. It is so pretty. It feels good under my hands. Yeah, I read the reviews that said it smelled, but I thought "how bad can it be"? So I bought it and wow, does it smell. I put it outside for a few days hoping that the smell would dissipate. I put it on my steering wheel and the smell was so bad it gave me a headache. So if the very strong smell of tire rubber is what you like, go for it. I'll be getting something else.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Shopping Queen

customer_reviews.title: Groovy and nice.
customer_reviews.text: We have a vintage VW Bug and this product is currently in use on the steering wheel of our fun little car. It was a little difficult to install, and I would say that you need two people to do it. We used a heat gun to soften the rubber and a long screw driver to help get the leverage to get it in place. It feels nice on the steering wheel and I am sure it will wear well. Groovy look for our old hippy car!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stinky, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Stinks! This smells like gasoline and the smell comes off on my hands. I can’t keep it in the car, let alone on the steering wheel. Update: I removed this from my steering wheel after only 12 hours and the next day I'm still getting gasoline smell on my hands. Something is really wrong with this item.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: no smell, fits 2015 rav 4
customer_reviews.text: there is a slight rubber smell to it but nothing overwhelming as stated in some other reviews. definitely take the advice on the package to warm it up (leave in warm car for about 30 minutes) because before i did that i was convinced i measured incorrectly. it fits my limited 2015 rav 4 - about 14.5 inches - but seemed a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Well fitting and cool 😎
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the seat covers. Colorful, comfortable and cool 😎. I mistakenly ordered for five seats so still trying to figure out how I can make it work. Love the steering wheel cover.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Deats

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and super soft
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft and fits on our Mazda 5 perfectly. However, it does get pilly rather fast.. but that doesn’t hinder the quality or funcationaly of the wheel cover. It’s a bit pungent at first, but it quickly goes away! We bought this to match our seat covers and we certainly are not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kayle Growcock

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much that I bought 2, will probably buy 2 more for when they wear out. My last one lasted right over 2 years. Has a little bit of a chemical smell but it goes away fast.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Would not suggest.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and is soft/comfortable, protecting my leather wheel. However, it smells really bad and every time I get into my car (still a week later) I am bombarded with rubber smell. The part I am having the most trouble with is that my hands smell like rubber after driving and even after a few washes of my hands. I have now washed it by hand twice and it didn't even make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Stebbins

customer_reviews.title: ... figured out that this cover obviously gets just as dirty as any other fabric
customer_reviews.text: There was a rough smell in my car and I finally figured out that this cover obviously gets just as dirty as any other fabric. I took it off, soaked it in water with good smelling cleaner and it did the trick. It isn't as vibrant as it once was, but I enjoy having my own personal style in my car. It keeps me comfortable where ever I go.
customer_reviews.author: CaiteKay

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, rough on hands.
customer_reviews.text: This product is visually everything I wanted and fits my steering wheel well. There was a strong rubber smell when I first opened it so I let it air out a couple days before installing. The last ‘criticism’ I have is the feel of the cover itself is very rough on my hands. Great for preventing the steering wheel from becoming too hot to touch, but a bit less comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Cute, BUT BEWARE THE SMELL!
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5 Star review, I really like the look and feel of cover HOWEVER, I had to return it because the smell! My gosh the smell is like burnt tires, and it doesn’t go away. I thought after a while it would fade, left it for 2 weeks and the smell was so strong I just couldn’t handle it anymore and took it out and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Chavs

customer_reviews.title: This steering wheel cover is beautiful and protects the wheel from both heat and chill
customer_reviews.text: After I buying my first car (a well-used and well-loved toyota camry by a family friend), I decided to spruce it up a bit. This steering wheel cover is beautiful and protects the wheel from both heat and chill. A bit difficult to put on, and smells strange at first, but both were minor issues. Months later, and I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Eicher

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it. Reconsider!
customer_reviews.text: Smells so awful. I bought this wheel cover for my new car and I really wish I hadn't. My car reeks. It's been a week and it still smells so bad. The quality is really good but the smell taints everything. I let it air out for a night and it hardly helped at all. Looks neat but everytime I get out of my car my hands smell. (Even after a good wash... that can't be good.)
customer_reviews.author: Howl at the moon

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: This did have an odd and strong smell at first. I aired it out for a couple of days then set it on my dash board for another day to warm up and give it some flexibility. I didn't have a problem putting it on the steering wheel of my '92 Thunderbird. It took a little effort but that's it. It stays in place and keeps the steering wheel cooler in our 100+ degree weather. The Baja design is less feminine than I would like (as a woman) but there's not much to choose from and I do live in the desert so, it fits. I am thinking of ordering the matching seat covers if they will fit my seats.
customer_reviews.author: l. wagner

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY -- IT STINKS
customer_reviews.text: I am really sorry I wasted my money on this. It has been sitting outside in Florida weather for two months to try to "air" (or bake) the terrible smell out. The only thing that happened is the smell got fainter and it got very worn-looking from the sun. Tonight I threw it in the trash -- it can never go into my car. If I could give zero stars, I would. Wish I had believed the other review about how bad it smells....
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awful chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I work in a lab yet this smell is something specials. The odor coming from the rubber is beyond strong and does not fade. The only reason I gave it 2 stars is because the material and design feel fine but the odor is truly unbearable. Gives you headaches.
customer_reviews.author: DjO

customer_reviews.title: A great match for any vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors on this steering wheel cover! It's so just bright and matches any interior. The grip is smooth but sturdy and didn't take too much effort to get onto my Rav4. The only quip about it was the smell, sort of like new car smell but slightly different, went away after a few days so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: H.L.

customer_reviews.title: Good look and comfortable feel
customer_reviews.text: Good look and comfortable feel, but it stinks like hell! Smells like rubber tires. I febreezed the heck out of it and left it outside for day to outgas. Then put it on my steering wheel, where is stunk up the whole car! Made my hands stink too, so I had to use hand sanitizer after every drive. It's been months now and it still stinks, but it is definitely better. If I knew how badly it reeked, I would not have gotten it, but I'm not going to throw it out or waste it either. Kinda sucks though.
customer_reviews.author: A. Floppenhopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: Was really nice for about a month, the cover held up nice and fit perfectly on my Buick rendezvous, but after owning it about a month it got a rip in it out of no where and started fraying really bad, one from the dollar tree is holding up better. Design was super cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy :(
customer_reviews.text: This smells so horribly of some kind of chemical/gasoline/factory or something that it stank up the whole house in the day in was in our kitchen. It did not fit on my steering wheel when I tried to put it on, and now I have it outside airing out. Trying to get rid of the smell and then will try again to make it fit for my car...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved this steering wheel cover at first once I got ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this steering wheel cover at first once I got past THE SMELL. It smelled so strongly of motor oil and somewhat like cigarettes, which was oddly nostalgic for me but after a while it just gave me a headache. I've owned it for about 2 months now and sadly it is pilling all over. Decent cover for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Caitybelle

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Cute design and a nice snug fit for my stearing wheel. Material has held up very well through every day use and through the heat of the FL summers. Only downside is that the sun has caused it to fade over time. Otherwise, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Anne

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool!
customer_reviews.text: So cool! Once the rubber portion stops off gassing I will love it even more. Also - I hadn't anticipated that it would increase the circumference of the handle as much as it did. My hands are on the smaller side so it takes some getting used to. My husband has no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinks, find something else or an updated product
customer_reviews.text: It stinks like rubber. Badly. It reminds me of the smell of a tire tube. It's strong enough that it stunk up my living room overnight while waiting to be installed. It's also a bit smooth and slippery for my tastes. It does however look super cool. I installed it on a topless Jeep so I can deal with the smell, but I wouldn't want it in a sealed car.
customer_reviews.author: TDG

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to and very durable.
customer_reviews.text: There had been some comments that this cover was smelly. I washed it in the washer and it’s not objectionable at all. I like that when it does get grungy you can just pull it off and wash it in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: dt

customer_reviews.title: Adorable.
customer_reviews.text: So cute and just as pictured. The only things I didn’t like was the difficulty in stretching it over my wheel(could be just my car) and the strong plastic smell that remains for months. Worth it for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Patience when installing it
customer_reviews.text: I really love the design on this. Following the directions to put it on slow really helped and I like the snug fit of it. I've only had it for a short time though and it has already gotten really piley which makes me think it might not last very long. Otherwise, it seems like it's good quality It has an inner lining which most other ones I've bought in the past never do and doesn't slide when I drive.
customer_reviews.author: Cariz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but impossible to install when cold.
customer_reviews.text: I put this on while the temps were quite cold here in IL. I put it in the dryer with a few towels for about five minutes before I could accomplish getting it on the steering wheel. Even then, it wasn't easy and I'm fairly strong. Good luck. On a positive note, I really like it. It did smell bad for a few days, but that's long gone now.
customer_reviews.author: Timberman

customer_reviews.title: really lovely
customer_reviews.text: I love that it can be easily washed. I had a hard time putting it on but managed with no help. My car is a Ford Focus. I got one for my friend's car and it didn't fit on her wheel
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Lasted forever!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while and thought I should review them. It's held up so well!! Better than any other one I've had, honestly. Color still looks good and you can't even tell it's a couple years old. So cute with the matching seat covers. I get complements on the set.
customer_reviews.author: kelley4yaFACE

customer_reviews.title: I don't hate it, but i really don't love it either
customer_reviews.text: Eh? It's okay for what it is. It does have a very rough texture that I'm not too fond of. I've had bajas that were much softer to the touch. I'll probably buy a different steering wheel cover soon because I just don't love this. I drive a lot (2-4 hrs a day) and there have been days that my hands hurt from the roughness.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: So cute, but would not fit.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is so cute and I had no issues with shipping or packaging whatsoever. But no matter how much I tried to stretch and maneuver it would not fit on my Jeep Compass. I even tried leaving it in the car on a hot day so stretching would be easier, but it didn't help much. I am honestly disappointed I couldn't get it on... it's super cute and matched with my black interior perfectly. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: stinks too much
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the odor was horrific. Even letting it air outside, and using baking soda didn't help. Not about to stink my car up, so I might just toss this and get one from O'Reilly's auto update: if you want your hands to stink, go for this one. Its been awhile and it still reeks.
customer_reviews.author: Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Steering Wheel Cover!
customer_reviews.text: This was a little tricky to put on! I recommend following the instructions and letting the steering wheel cover sit in a hot car for a while to become malleable. I tried to put it on without letting it soften up, and it was impossible, even for my husband. I read that others had a problem with this item smelling bad, but I didn't encounter that. It smelled fine to me and was exactly what I wanted, a cloth steering wheel cover that stayed put and didn't move around. I would buy this again, and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful <3
customer_reviews.text: Needed the help of my dad to get it on my wheel but I love it! Adorable in my car and the quality is insane. Is pretty thick so not for small hands!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Moreland

customer_reviews.title: I like this cover
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover. It sure is nice to not have a freezing steering wheel in the winter or an extremely hot steering wheel in the summer. I also like that it feels good on my hands. Only weird thing is that my hands smell of rubber after driving. It seems to be less now that I have had it for a while. It is not offensive to me so I don't mind it.
customer_reviews.author: Ygraine Pendragon

customer_reviews.title: Started out well but ...
customer_reviews.text: .... less than a year in, the cover is completely warped. Couldn't take the summer heat (the main reason I had bought it :-)). It is so warped now, I can't even put it on the wheel fully. Taken it off because it is a hazard to drive with it in place. Will look for a diff. brand ...
customer_reviews.author: SOswal

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my car, but my fault
customer_reviews.text: Even though I couldn't use this product, I wish I could have. It's beautiful and feels really good. But I had put in search criteria for a Prius-sized wheel cover and this came up in the search - I didn't read everything, and it turned out it was just a regular wheel cover and would NOT fit my car. Super-disappointed, as there is a whole seat-cover system made out of the same stuff and I was thinking about getting all of it. I guess it saved me some money, LOL!!
customer_reviews.author: Safari Lori

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a quality product. It’s a little hard to put on but glad it fits tight and snug. I’ve had it over a year and it still looks new!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great but stinky.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this cover. I have the seat covers as well. Original wheel cover lasted about 3 years & this order was my replacement, original got very faded by the sun. Color is bright on the new one though and the cover feels good in hand, very comfortable. The only downside is that this new cover absolutely stinks of rubber. My whole car reeks of it still and it's been about a week. Hopefully it airs out soon, I really would hate to have to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise KH

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: 2008 Nissan Versa. Fits great and looks good. Getting it on was a hassle but worth it. There IS a strong plastic odor that takes awhile to fade. I would suggest leaving the cover in a well vented area for a couple days before installing it on your steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but loose.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, that smell is overwhelming. I have my windows open trying to air it out. Other than that, it was pretty easy to get on. It's not at all stretchy so you have to work it a bit. I have noticed that it's kind of loose when driving. Hopefully I'll get used to it, though. It looks really good, though.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Evans

customer_reviews.title: Cute but smelly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wheel cover for the price. Absolutely love it, though when I first got it, it had a gasoline smell that I couldn't stand. Had to buy a car air freshener and keep my windows cracked for a while and the smell is finally gone. But it was a pretty bad smell for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kasia G

customer_reviews.title: Nice...but,
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cover for my steering wheel, if...I could ever actually get it on!!! I so desperately have tried to stretch this so many times to fit it on my steering wheel..be warned it's very difficult!! If I wasnt patient, I would have probably returned this item...I'm hopeful I'll eventually be able to stretch it enough to get it in place. I've followed the directions with no luck yet! If I'm able to get it on..I'll let ya know!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Kowal

customer_reviews.title: I love the look but unfortunately cannot get it to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit the Prius C steering wheel. The steering wheel is just slightly smaller, and more oblong or oval, rather than circular. I love the look but unfortunately cannot get it to fit without dangerously sliding around. Too bad. I'll try to give it to someone else because it is very cute and seems like a great cover...but what am I supposed to do for my naked steering wheel?
customer_reviews.author: C. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it has a weird chemical smell that ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it has a weird chemical smell that was very strong when I first got it, and it's subsiding over time, but it's been over a week and I can still smell the chemical on my hands after I get out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this steering wheel cover! It's not one of those cheap looking ones that stretch. It fits my Jeep Rubicon perfectly, though it was a bit difficult to get on. I know a lot of people reviewing complained of a rubbery smell-mine didn't have this issue. Yes, there was a small hint of rubber, but nothing severe at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: its awesome..
customer_reviews.text: its awesome... at first. dug the idea of a mexican blanket style cover. i drove 8 hours on a trip, it was pilling like a fleece jacket. i like it enough to keep it on but quality is very low. mine did not stink like others have
customer_reviews.author: George M.

customer_reviews.title: stink-o-rama
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely little steering wheel cover, but I have yet to put it in my vehicle - it smells SO BAD. I have left it sitting on my front porch for over a week in an effort to air it out. Still stinks.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER PERRY

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Fits my steering wheel nicely (2009 Honda CRV)
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my hands a little warmer (I live in Seattle and my hands get super-cold when I drive). Looks nice. Fits my steering wheel nicely (2009 Honda CRV). It's a little hard to get over the wheel, so you should follow the instructions and warm it up before stretching it over.
customer_reviews.author: N. Luchsinger

customer_reviews.title: This steering wheel looks just like the photo
customer_reviews.text: This steering wheel looks just like the photo! I drive a 2012 Ford Fiesta and it fit the steering wheel. It almost seemed like it would not fit but with enough strength and pressure I was able to get it on. I did put in the washing machine one cycle to get the tire smell out. It is basically cloth wrapped around a small bike tire so it does smell like rubber or a new car smell. The fabric is very thick and sturdy and it is a fantastic accessory especially for the price! I love it! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't personally like the way it feels on my hands
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but very tight. Needed to spend a couple minutes in the dryer before putting it on and I also needed help from two more hands. I don't personally like the way it feels on my hands, makes them dry, but it doesn't seem to bug my two other friends that have it. Very cute. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I agree about the smell.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with most comments, the steering wheel cover DOES have a bit of a smell. To me, it just smells a bit like rubber (which is understandable because it is new and rubber on the inside). It may make your car smell for a few week if you put it on during a warmer season, but should go away after a while. I can onl faintly smell it anymore and it doesnt bother me ebcause it can be easily masked by an airfreshener or opening a window. Great quality product, and i love the design. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Graham

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, looks nice and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived just as described. Put it on a 2001 Honda steering wheel and it fits like a glove. There is a very very strong smell from this cover, though. Kind of like a chemical/rubber/smokey smell. I have had it on for three days now and I still have to wash my hands after driving to get the smell off of my hands. It's not as strong as the first 48 hours, but it will be nice when it's gone. The price is great and it appears well made. No pilling or loose threads. Just gotta leave the windows cracked at first from the awful smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sue F

customer_reviews.title: Like the other reviews said
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviews said, this smells terrible. My hands smell like gasoline every time I drive my truck. I have to wear gloves to touch the steering wheel, which defeats the purpose of using this steering wheel cover. I washed it in my washing machine like one reviewer suggested. It helped, but the scent is still pretty strong. It does help to keep my hands warm. So I gave it 3 stars instead of the 2 stars I was tempted to give it.
customer_reviews.author: kazzam

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute steering wheel! Cheaper on Amazon than at Auto Zone.
customer_reviews.text: Cute steering wheel cover but it pills! Not a huge deal, especially if you have a pill remover. I guess it's to be expected from a fabric item that your hands are constantly sliding all over. I have a leather steering wheel and my hands kept slipping after I put on lotion so this solved the problem. Apparently there are also matching seat covers somewhere..
customer_reviews.author: KatSin

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during a Phoenix summer. It still gets warm but it works perfectly. You need at least two if not three people to put on but it works great
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Lasted over three years!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this on my steering wheel for about 3 years and 2 months. I recently started noticing places where the threads have worn away. I've loved it every day, and now I'm ordering another one. Here's to another three good years!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: The reason I love it is because my better half loves it
customer_reviews.text: The reason I love it is because my better half loves it. She finds it very secure, comfortable and colorful. On the other hands (mine), I find the grip too wide, and I do not especially like the feel of the fabric. Other reviews mention the difficulty of attaching this wheel cover. This is true. My wife would not have been strong enough to attach it. I am not very strong but was just strong enough. While attaching it though, I wish I could have watched my friend the Navy Seal simply snap it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. George

customer_reviews.title: Nice Textured Feel
customer_reviews.text: Nice steering wheel cover, has some texture to it. Feels just like the rougher blankets that look like this. It's a little tight to put on, but follow the directions and goes on. Had some loose strings that I needed to cut off but all in all I really like this unique steering wheel cover. Going to get the matching seat covers next. And yes it has an odor to it BUT let it air out after taking it out of the packaging and it dissipates.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy&Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult to put on the steering wheel. The material is bothersome to the touch and it started falling apart eventhough I only bought it 3 month ago
customer_reviews.author: rawan elashkar

customer_reviews.title: Great for heat protection
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors and that it keeps my hands protected from the California heat, but it smelled really strong for weeks after installing. After a couple of months usage it is now pilling up quite a bit. I don't mind too much, but others might. It's not very noticeable, but you feel it until your fingers (like little bumps, like what happens to sweaters).
customer_reviews.author: Notblueatall

product_meta.title: Bell Automotive 22-1-53212-1 Universal Baja Blanket Steering Wheel Cover
product_meta.description: Size:Baja BlanketBell Automotive steering wheel covers hide scuffs and other imperfections while catering to personalization and comfort. The HyperFlex Core steering wheel covers are flexible, light, and odor-free; they fit most steering wheels in vehicles. The HyperFlex Core is made from a specialized polymer which produces materials that are "rubber-like" in softness and flexibility, but without the offensive rubber tire odor. This steering wheel features low- and high-temperature toughness and is resistant to stress-crack and UV radiation.
feature_bullets: Designed for universal fit on steering wheels 14-1/2" to 15-1/2" (37cm to 39cm)
Patented HyperFlex Core for quick and easy installation
Resistant to stress-crack and UV radiation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,955 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
